name: VA_13 | LD52
description:
**Web version available at:**

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/870188

As the last remaining member of bunker VA-13, you awake to crashing of rocks and sounds of mechanical limbs coming towards the doors. 

It's been 30 years since humans were pushed underground, and now the robots of coming for you. Using different weapons and abilities, fend of the never-ending horde of killer robots. 

Harvest their scrap to craft abilities that increase speed, fire rate, weaken your enemies, and much more.

Made in 48 hours for LD52. 

A/D/Left Arrow/Right Arrow - Move

Space/W/Up Arrow - Jump

Z/M - Shoot

S/Down Arrow + Space - Fall through platforms
